white lane markings including what appears to be "BUS" text painted on the right

direction as the camera view. A pedestrian is crossing the street from right to
left in the middle of the roadway. Several parked cars are visible along the
right side of the street, and there appear to be a few pedestrians on the
sidewalk on the left side near the buildings. Trees are planted along the
sidewalks providing some greenery to the urban environment. The lighting
suggests it is daytime with partly cloudy skies visible between the buildings.
Traffic appears light with minimal vehicle movement beyond the distant bus and
the pedestrian actively crossing the street.
